findings.title: Improper amtClaimed Accounting in migrate()
findings.description: The `amtClaimed` variable is not updated in the one-step migration logic of the `migrate()` function, resulting in incorrect reflection of the amount of new FEG tokens users have claimed.

findings.title: Accommodation of Non-ERC20-Compliant Tokens
findings.description: The `transfer` routine does not have a return value defined and implemented, which may cause a call to `transfer` to expect a return value and unfortunately revert.

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: In the `Migrator` contract, there is a privileged account, i.e., `dev`, that can rescue tokens from the contract.
